types:type.name: Account

%dw 2.0
type Account = Array<{| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String, "type": String, address: String, air_miles: Number {"typeId": "int"}, created_at: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"id\\\":1,\\\"name\\\":\\\"ACME\\\",\\\"type\\\":\\\"business\\\",\\\"address\\\":\\\"1 Main St,Los Angeles,CA,92000,USA\\\",\\\"air_miles\\\":5000,\\\"created_at\\\":\\\"2020-09-21T12:00:00Z\\\"},{\\\"id\\\":2,\\\"name\\\":\\\"Jane Doe\\\",\\\"type\\\":\\\"personal\\\",\\\"address\\\":\\\"1 Main St,Los Angeles,CA,92000,USA\\\",\\\"air_miles\\\":50000,\\\"created_at\\\":\\\"2010-01-01T00:00:00Z\\\"}]"}
